dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "Hah... what was that about you not hitting fast notes, Yuri..?"

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "Huff... I see... I was correct about your conviction, though. No melody is too difficult for you."

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Ehehe... You guys must be exhausted after that. Ooo! How about some tea and cookies?"
